high_stakes_assessment.reason: Highest validity (QWK), good reliability, lowest bias, acceptable cost

formative_feedback.reason: Best cost-effectiveness, fastest processing, acceptable accuracy

large_scale_grading.reason: Lowest cost, reasonable reliability, but watch for over-grading bias

research_validation.reason: High reliability (ICC), good validity, consistent performance

warnings.lenient_strategy: Shows significant over-grading bias (+0.44 to +0.47). Use with caution for summative assessment.
warnings.gemini_few_shot: Low consistency with high variance items. Requires multiple trials or avoid.
warnings.cost_consideration: ChatGPT costs ~33.8x more than Gemini per essay.
